issues.explanation:
Special characters are unsupported by Hugo slugify and may cause 
shell escaping issues.

Current:  config@v2.md
Suggested: configv2.md

Allowed characters: [a-z0-9-_.]
Invalid characters found: @
issues.fix: Rename to remove special characters: configv2.md

issues.explanation: Markdown files should have YAML frontmatter with required fields (tags, categories, id)
issues.fix: Add frontmatter with tags: [], categories: [], and id fields
